text: Sir Brian Leon Barder, KCMG (20 June 1934 – 19 September 2017)Sir Brian Barder was a British diplomat, author, blogger and civil liberties advocate. He was born in Bristol, England. Barder was British Ambassador to Ethiopia (1982–86); Ambassador to Poland (1986–88); High Commissioner to Nigeria and concurrently Ambassador to Bénin (1988–91) and High Commissioner to Australia (1991–94).
